appName: All In One Summer Sports VR
displayName: All In One Summer Sports VR
display_name: All In One Summer Sports VR
display_long_description:
# ★ Discode Link: https://discord.gg/cAJShemkw2  
Welcome to All-In-One Summer Sports VR! We've gathered 11 summer sports for you in one game. Go to a hot tropical resort and enjoy dizzying sports games. You can compete online with friends or other players from all over the world, train on different difficulty levels, and win challenging competitions. 
[media]
 # BEACH VOLLEYBALL: 
This is a 2 vs 2 game with a ball on the beach sand. Play with friends or realistic AI bots that won't be inferior to you to win. Toss the ball, shoot, receive, and block your opponent's attacks!  
[media]
# JET SKI: 
A high-speed jet ski racing game. Ride around a tropical island with your friends, dodge obstacles, and use different items to prevent yourself from being overtaken. 
[media]
# FISHING: 
Enjoy comfortable fishing with your friends!
[media]
# PISTOL SHOOTING: 
Test your shooting skills in various ranges. Hit targets with realistic physics and immersive sound effects. 
[media]
 # WATER PARK:
 Enjoy a variety of water rides and activities. Have fun with friends and cool off in the refreshing water!  
[media]
[media]
 # AND OTHER GAMES: 
Swimming, Water Basketball, Cycling, Frisbee, Water Polo, and Clay Shooting will also be waiting for you! Discover many exciting challenges and activities with All-In-One Summer Sports VR!
